articles.title: Huddersfield Town boss Mark Fotheringham makes big David Kasumu prediction in spite of red card at Luton Town - Yorkshire Live
articles.description: The midfielder was dismisssed for a second yellow card late on at Kenilworth Road but had performed well to continue his good start to life at the John Smith's Stadium
